name: CleverTap
description:
CleverTap is a leading customer engagement and retention platform that empowers app-first brands to deliver personalized messaging experiences across multiple channels. 
With a focus on improving user engagement, retention, and lifetime value, CleverTap offers a comprehensive suite of features designed to address the needs of retention and growth teams. Our platform offers a unified product with audience analytics, deep segmentation, multi-channel engagement, product recommendations, and automation. It caters specifically to the needs of retention and growth teams.
Partner with CleverTap to streamline your messaging strategies, drive growth, and unlock the full potential of your customer communications. Learn more at clevertap.com.
focus_areas: Omnichannel Campaigns: Reach customers seamlessly across multiple channels, including WhatsApp, for a consistent messaging experience.
Targeted Campaigns: Leverage advanced targeting capabilities to reach the right audience with precision, ensuring maximum impact.
Personalized Messaging Experiences: Offer more contextual messaging experience to engage users on WhatsApp.
